explains: v. 资助或补助（subsidize 的过去时和过去分词）
wordGroup: subsidized housing 建房补贴；资助房屋；补贴住房

sentences.en: Its heavily subsidized economy is in ruins.
sentences.cn: 它的严重依赖于资助的经济已崩溃了。

sentences.en: France operates a system of subsidized loans to dairy farmers.
sentences.cn: 法国对奶农实行补贴贷款制度。

sentences.en: Around the world, governments have subsidized the housing of middle- and upper-income groups.
sentences.cn: 全世界各政府都补贴过中高收入人群的住房。
